data.message: I would love go to on Sunday the 10th of december! It would be a fantastic way for me to start the holidays and watch Matt terry and all the other amazing singers perform! The person I would bring along would be Emma! The only thing that I wanted for Christmas this year was #JBB tickets but unfortunately they had all sold out by the time I got round to getting them😓! So please please let my wish come true💙 #jinglebellball #cocacola #mattterry #louisajohnson #capitalfm
